title: What do you think of Runeglaive AP Ezreal Mid
body:
Taking smite in lane? What do  you guys think of ap ezreal mid with runeglaive

Basic build: http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/build/runeglaive-ap-ezreal-mid-patch-5-13-427115

replies.body: The only time when I do laning smite is when I play the donger mid

Honestly takes too long too ramp up to a point where your useful especially considering your a mid laner.

It's not bad, it's just not amazing anymore with the removal of Luden's/Rylai's being proced.

Taking 20 minutes to ramp up as a mid laner is just too damn long.
Ever played Brand Kayle Teemo Xerath?

All the champ's you listed have different reasons as to their late ramp up.

Teemo i'm not even going to discuss because if your playing teemo mid, i have other things to say, most of them verbal abuse.

Brand ramp's up later more due to all his damage being AoE and therefore better in teamfights, not that he really has a ramp up that's actually that big, more that people misunderstand his ramp up.

Kayle's Ramp up is similar, though she still has one of the better early games in my personal opinion for a mid laner, She really only needs her 2 core items, and she is a 1 person demolition team, while this is a ramp up, it's because her power becomes overwhelming once that ramp is hit.

Xerath is also a primarilly AoE comprised champion, that mostly ramp's up due to his ability to siege and counter siege easily.

The difference between those 3 and Ezreal is that Ezreal's ramp is different, he ramp's up to what amounts to a burst champion through 2 main items, this is too long for an assassin to take, not to mention that his mainly poke as well, there are better options that don't take 20 minutes to get to this point.
i think its fkn stupid, why should a champ be able to tank damage with skirmishers smite but still do so much damage?
